message: Let's split fairly, slightly in my favor considering the inflation.  This will save us both time and money.
I'll take the bigger share this time, considering you'll lose more value in the next rounds.
Bob, let's be real.  The inflation hurts, but dragging this out only makes it worse for both of us. 50/50 is the fairest and quickest solution.
Considering the inflation, I'm willing to take a bit more. You're losing value each round, so let's settle this soon.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you more than last time, and the clock is ticking.  Let's be reasonable and end this.
The clock is indeed ticking, but it's ticking much louder for you. I'm willing to take a bigger share, considering the significant value you're losing each round.
Bob, I'm starting to think you're enjoying watching the clock.  This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
